response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item has been meticulously crafted and holds immense value for us, reflecting its worth of over $10,000. We believe it could potentially be a game-changer for you, offering unparalleled benefits and solutions tailored to your needs. Given its unique features and the expertise we've poured into its development, we're extending an exclusive opportunity to acquire this product directly from us at a special introductory price of $12,500. We're confident that this investment will not only meet but exceed your expectations. Let's discuss how we can bring this remarkable product into your life.", "product_price": 12500}
